revisionDesc.change: Entered Greek text from P.Herakl.Bank.1. General remark (1): passim I filled out abbreviations like (|γρ|), (|τρ|), (|σιτοκαπ|), (|λει|) etc into (γρ(αμματεύς)), (τρ(απεζίτης)), (σιτοκάπ(ηλος)), (λει(τουργός)) in the appropriate casus, as far as made clear by editors translation and/or commentary. General remark (2): also filled out (τάλ.) into ((τάλαντα)) or ((τάλαντον)). General remark (3): the text shows up many examples of a line preceded by a symbol with the form of two crossing knives, which I interpreted as a check mark, so *check* (see Leiden Help), with the result, that the symbol now has the form of a simple slash. 1a col 2, lin3: not clear where editoirs suggestion αὐτο[ς] or Αὐτο[μέδων] should be placed; lin6,7: not clear whether in lacuna before the number a "thousand" should be supposed; lin.15: don't understand how φ.2[.1] could be φυλ[ακίτης], as suggested by editor; col 3, lin5: don't know what to do with υ and β whithin the cluster of letters, from which I gathered, based upon the translation, ι =10 and ν=50; lin.8: regularised ἐγλογου into ἐκλογου; 1b lin2: what to do with the symbol σ (=200) after the number 1301-1399?; lin5: Μασυλλος (text) or Μαρσυλλος (translation)?; the number 'A (=1000) seems to be translated by 300. 1d lin9: changed ἐνκυκλιου into ἐγκυκλιου, as is also quoted by editor in the commentary; 1e col 2 lin4: added brackets (|αργυ|); lin19: not clear how editors suggestion Ἰταλου exactly should fit corresponding to the letters and the traces in the text. 1f col 2 lin17: πα[.?] in stead of .2[.?], as is written in the commentary?; lin18: not clear why editor does not fill out Ἀρενδωτου, according to the commentary. 1g lin16: added abbreviation brackets in ἐγλ(ογ ), [ ] is typo (see lin 4, 6, 12 et al.); ,lin17: filled out [Ἀρχινος] corresponding with translation and commentary; lin22: not clear where η, suggested by editor, should be placed, no such sign being represented in the original text.
